nodes.text: The L19a was a freighter produced by Surron StarTech. It was the initial production run of the L19 Heavy Freighter and was much more luxurious than the standard L19. It had a limited production run as was highly desirable. This meant prices for a genuine L19a could be four times the amount of a L19.
Moff Aricos Dreleene owned a customized L19, named the First Edition. He had modified this ship to resemble the more expensive L19a.
